transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Tarshree ho idhar aap?
Executive: Haan, haan bolo, bolo.
Customer: Jaldi karwao yaar.
Executive: Haan ji, system pe aa jaiye.
Customer: System open hai?

Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji, open hai.
Customer: Open hai.
Executive: Main aapko ek official email ID dena, usmein video meet link send kar raha hun. Bheja hai na, usko join kijiye.
Customer: Ok.
Executive: Office 11@indiamart ki taraf se hai.
Executive: Email pe video meet aaya hoga dekhiye.


Customer: [unintelligible]

Customer: Main aapko screen show kar raha hun apni.
Customer: Haan, pehle mujhe ye bataiye ye wala aap mere ko show ho rahi hai, aap mujhe ye bataiye ye jo, wo maine ye wala download kara dekho.
Executive: Ye maine apni band kar di, aap apni screen share karke send karo.
Customer: Haan.

Executive: Aapki screen mujhe show ho gayi.
Customer: Ye wali kara hai maine.
Executive: Ye open kiye hai na, isse kara?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Nahi nahi, Google Chrome kholiye.
Customer: Kaat di maine isko.

Executive: Ok sir ji, main karta hun dusre number pe aapke.
Customer: Haan ji?
Executive: Dusre number pe karta hun, kat raha hai baar baar.
Customer: Haan, haan dusre number pe kar dijiye.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants executive to resolve issue quickly.

- Customer is having trouble joining video meet.



Resolution:

- Executive sent video meet link to customer's email.

- Executive asked customer to share screen.

- Executive suggested opening Google Chrome.

- Executive will call on another number.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call customer on another number.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Annoyed -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- video meet, screen share, technical support
